name: Da Game (Melooon)
description:
You are accused of a possible crime and find yourself in a mix of unfortunate situations; you "head to the hills" and encounter tongues (yes tongues) AND eat people AND MORE. Featuring at least 200 UNIQUE artworks and entirely no soundtrack, this is the ultimate basis to found your sanity on, I entirely agree.

This is presented to you as a retrospective transcendental example of developmental digital art in its finest form, a multiphaseic existential narrative created when I was 12 in collaboration with @pirik who was also about 12.
